TEXT.TITLE: M.S. CARRIERS <MSCA> COMPLETES OFFERING
TEXT.BODY: M.S. Carriers Inc said it has completed an offering of 550,000 common shares, including 350,000 sold by shareholders, for 32.25 dlrs each. Lead underwriters were Alex. Brown and Sons Inc <ABSB> and Morgan Keegan Inc <MOR>. Reuter
